message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $170. I think it will be very valuable for you!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth a lot to me. Could you meet me halfway at $135?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. Could we agree on $110 for the product?
